layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x38
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x38
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x0
      LayoutTable (floating) {table} at (0,0) size 272x30 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 270x28
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 270x24
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 266x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 262x19
                text run at (2,2) width 262: "This table should be left aligned on the page"
